type: Legendary Creature – Human Advisor Lord Noble
rules_text:
[i]All For One[/i] – Whenever Lucina & Robin attack, they deal X damage to target creature, where X is the number of other legendary creatures you control.
[i]Dual Strike[/i] – Whenever you attack a player, if exactly two creatures are attacking that player, both of those creatures gain double strike until end of turn.
